original: Enderstein, Per Elis, sekreterare, Skara, f. 31/1/90 i Hanebo, Gävleb. 1., av Hjalmar E. o. Hanna Johansson. G. 19 m. Ebba Byttner. Barn: Karin f. 20, Gösta 23, Lars 26, Lennart o. Bo 28, Maja 33. — Stud:ex. 09, fil. mag. 15, agronomex. 16. Aman. v. lantbr:styr. 16-19, sekr. i Gbgs o. Boh. 1. hush:sällsk. 19-22, dito i Ska-rab. 1. hush:sällsk. sed. 22. V. ordf. i kristidsstyr., led. av o. ordf. i ett flert. styr. o. ndr. RNO, RVO, Ska-rab. 1. husk:sällsk. GM, LLA.
translated: Enderstein, Per Elis, Secretary, Skara, born January 31, 1890 in Hanebo, Gävleborg County, the first child of Hjalmar E. and Hanna Johansson. Married in 1919 to Ebba Byttner. Children: Karin (born 1920), Gösta (born 1923), Lars (born 1926), Lennart and Bo (born 1928), Maja (born 1933). He received his high school diploma in 1909, completed a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1915, and completed an agronomy degree in 1916. He served as an assistant to the agricultural board from 1916-1919, secretary in Gothenburg and Bohuslän's household society from 1919-1922, and as secretary in Skaraborg's household society from 1922. He was the vice chairman of the crisis management committee, member and chairman of several committees and others. He was awarded RNO, RVO, Skaraborg's household society's GM and LLA.

award.name: Royal Order of the North Star
